args.natural_language_statement: Suppose f : ‚Ñù^n ‚Üí ‚Ñù is differentiable at x0 ‚àà ‚Ñù^n. Show that | f(x0 + h) - f(x0) - Df(x0) h | ‚â§ ‚à•Df(x0)‚à• ‚à•h‚à• + o(‚à•h‚à•) as h ‚Üí 0. Translate to Lean4 mathlib statement (no proof, end with := by sorry). Use Mathlib imports and proper names.

retrieved_examples.nl: If f is differentiable at x0, then f(x0+h)-f(x0)-Df(x0) h = o(\|h\|).
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

open Filter

variable {E F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E] [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù F]

theorem differentiable_at.has_fderiv (f : E ‚Üí F) {x0 : E} (h : E) (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  (fun h => f (x0 + h) - f x0 - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] F) h) =o[ùìù 0] fun h => ‚Äñh‚Äñ := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Filter

variable {n : ‚Ñï}

/-- Suppose f : ‚Ñù^n ‚Üí ‚Ñù is differentiable at x0 ‚àà ‚Ñù^n. Then the error
    f(x0+h) - f(x0) - Df(x0) h is bounded by the operator norm times ‚Äñh‚Äñ plus a smaller-order term. -/
theorem differentiable_at.error_le_opNorm_add_o {f : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {x0 : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  ‚àÉ r : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí ‚Ñù,
    (IsLittleO r (fun h => ‚Äñh‚Äñ) (ùìù (0 : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù))) ‚àß
    ‚àÄ h,
      |f (x0 + h) - f x0 - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù) h|
        ‚â§ ‚Äñ(fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù)‚Äñ * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + r h := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Filter Asymptotics ContinuousLinearMap

variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]

/-- Suppose f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù is differentiable at x0 ‚àà E. Then the error
    f(x0+h) - f(x0) - Df(x0) h is bounded by the operator norm times ‚Äñh‚Äñ plus a smaller-order term.
    Formally: there exists r = o(‚Äñh‚Äñ) such that pointwise
    |f(x0+h) - f x0 - fderiv f x0 h| ‚â§ ‚Äñfderiv f x0‚Äñ * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + r h. -/
theorem differentiable_at.error_le_opNorm_add_o {f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {x0 : E}
  (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  ‚àÉ r : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù, (r =o[ùìù (0 : E)] fun h => ‚Äñh‚Äñ) ‚àß
    ‚àÄ h : E,
      |f (x0 + h) - f x0 - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù) h|
        ‚â§ ‚Äñ(fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù)‚Äñ * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + r h := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Filter Asymptotics ContinuousLinearMap

variable {n : ‚Ñï}

/-- Suppose f : ‚Ñù^n ‚Üí ‚Ñù is differentiable at x0 ‚àà ‚Ñù^n. Then the error
    f(x0+h) - f(x0) - Df(x0) h is bounded by the operator norm times ‚Äñh‚Äñ plus a smaller-order term.
    Formally: there exists r = o(‚Äñh‚Äñ) such that
    |f(x0+h) - f x0 - fderiv f x0 h| ‚â§ ‚Äñfderiv f x0‚Äñ * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + r h. -/
theorem differentiable_at.error_le_opNorm_add_o {f : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {x0 : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  ‚àÉ r : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí ‚Ñù,
    Asymptotics.IsLittleO (ùìù (0 : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) r (fun h => ‚Äñh‚Äñ) ‚àß
    ‚àÄ h : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù,
      |f (x0 + h) - f x0 - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù) h|
        ‚â§ ‚Äñ(fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù)‚Äñ * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + r h := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Asymptotics ContinuousLinearMap

variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]

/-- Suppose f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù is differentiable at x0 ‚àà E. Then the error
    f(x0+h) - f(x0) - Df(x0) h is bounded by the operator norm times ‚Äñh‚Äñ plus a smaller-order term.
    Formally: there exists r = o(‚Äñh‚Äñ) as h ‚Üí 0 such that
    |f(x0+h) - f x0 - fderiv f x0 h| ‚â§ ‚Äñfderiv f x0‚Äñ * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + r h. -/
theorem differentiable_at.error_le_opNorm_add_o {f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {x0 : E} (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  ‚àÉ r : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù,
    IsLittleO (ùìù (0 : E)) r (fun h => ‚Äñh‚Äñ) ‚àß
    ‚àÄ h : E,
      |f (x0 + h) - f x0 - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù) h|
        ‚â§ ‚Äñ(fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù)‚Äñ * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + r h := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Filter Asymptotics ContinuousLinearMap

variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]

/-- Suppose f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù is differentiable at x0 ‚àà E. Then the error
    f(x0+h) - f(x0) - Df(x0) h is bounded by the operator norm times ‚Äñh‚Äñ plus a smaller-order term.
    Formally: there exists r = o(‚Äñh‚Äñ) as h ‚Üí 0 such that
    |f(x0+h) - f x0 - fderiv f x0 h| ‚â§ ‚Äñfderiv f x0‚Äñ * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + r h. -/
theorem differentiable_at.error_le_op_norm_add_o {f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {x0 : E} (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  ‚àÉ r : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù,
    IsLittleO (ùìù (0 : E)) r (fun h => ‚Äñh‚Äñ) ‚àß
    ‚àÄ h : E,
      |f (x0 + h) - f x0 - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù) h|
        ‚â§ ‚Äñ(fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù)‚Äñ * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + r h := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Filter Asymptotics ContinuousLinearMap

variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]

/-- Suppose f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù is differentiable at x0 ‚àà E. Then the error
    f(x0+h) - f(x0) - Df(x0) h is bounded by the operator norm times ‚Äñh‚Äñ plus a smaller-order term.
    Formally: there exists r = o(‚Äñh‚Äñ) as h ‚Üí 0 such that
    |f(x0+h) - f x0 - fderiv f x0 h| ‚â§ ‚Äñfderiv f x0‚Äñ * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + r h. -/
theorem differentiable_at.error_le_op_norm_add_o {f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {x0 : E} (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  ‚àÉ r : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù,
    (r =o[ùìù (0 : E)] fun h => ‚Äñh‚Äñ) ‚àß
    ‚àÄ h : E,
      |f (x0 + h) - f x0 - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù) h|
        ‚â§ ‚Äñ(fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù)‚Äñ * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + r h := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Filter Asymptotics

variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]

/-- If f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù is differentiable at x0, then the remainder
    f(x0 + h) - f x0 - fderiv f x0 h is little-o of ‚Äñh‚Äñ as h ‚Üí 0. -/
theorem differentiable_at.remainder_is_little_o {f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {x0 : E}
  (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  (fun h => f (x0 + h) - f x0 - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù) h) =o[ùìù (0 : E)] fun h => ‚Äñh‚Äñ := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Filter Asymptotics ContinuousLinearMap

variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]

/-- If f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù is differentiable at x0, then the remainder
    f(x0 + h) - f x0 - fderiv f x0 h is little-o of ‚Äñh‚Äñ as h ‚Üí 0. -/
theorem differentiable_at.remainder_is_little_o {f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {x0 : E}
  (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  (fun h => f (x0 + h) - f x0 - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù) h) =o[ùìù 0] fun h => ‚Äñh‚Äñ := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Asymptotics ContinuousLinearMap

variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]

/-- Suppose f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù is differentiable at x0 ‚àà E. Then the error
    f(x0+h) - f(x0) - Df(x0) h is bounded by the operator norm times ‚Äñh‚Äñ plus a smaller-order term.
    Formally: there exists r = o(‚Äñh‚Äñ) as h ‚Üí 0 such that
    |f(x0+h) - f x0 - fderiv f x0 h| ‚â§ ‚Äñfderiv f x0‚Äñ * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + r h. -/
theorem differentiable_at.error_le_op_norm_add_o {f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {x0 : E} (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  ‚àÉ r : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù,
    IsLittleO (nhds (0 : E)) r (fun h => ‚Äñh‚Äñ) ‚àß
    ‚àÄ h : E,
      |f (x0 + h) - f x0 - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù) h|
        ‚â§ ‚Äñ(fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 : E ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] ‚Ñù)‚Äñ * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + r h := by sorry
